title: is this a hand drawn logo or a typeface

comments.content:
It’s not Bragadoccio, Futura Black, or Traffic, so I’m stumped.

- Lex

It looks a bit like [Doufff](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123030542/http:/www.fonts.com/FindFonts/detail.htm?pid=424128) or [Alpha Geometrique - Compact](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123030542/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/AlphaGeometrique/) by Clotilde Olyff. But thats not it either...
